46 #if defined(DEBUG) || defined(_DEBUG) || !(defined(NDEBUG) || defined(_NDEBUG))

52 #if TARGET_IPHONE_SIMULATOR == 1
53 #define MAPLEMUSE_IOS_SIMULATOR 1
54 #define MAPLEMUSE_OSX 1
55 #define MAPLEMUSE_IOS 0
56 #elif TARGET_OS_IPHONE == 1
57 #define MAPLEMUSE_OSX 0

59 #define MAPLEMUSE_IOS 1

63 #define MAPLEMUSE_IOS 0
64 #endif

104 // some definition of Application Binary Interface
105 #if defined(__arm__)
106 #if defined(__ARM_ARCH_7A__)
107 #if defined(__ARM_NEON__)
108 #if defined(__ARM_PCS_VFP)
109 #define ABI "armeabi-v7a/NEON (hard-float)"
110 #else
111 #define ABI "armeabi-v7a/NEON"
112 #endif
113 #else
114 #if defined(__ARM_PCS_VFP)
115 #define ABI "armeabi-v7a (hard-float)"
116 #else
117 #define ABI "armeabi-v7a"
118 #endif
119 #endif
120 #else
121 #define ABI "armeabi"
122 #endif
123 #elif defined(__i386__)
124 #define ABI "x86"
125 #elif defined(__x86_64__)
126 #define ABI "x86_64"
127 #elif defined(__mips64) /* mips64el-* toolchain defines __mips__ too */
128 #define ABI "mips64"
129 #elif defined(__mips__)
130 #define ABI "mips"
131 #elif defined(__aarch64__)
132 #define ABI "arm64-v8a"
133 #else
134 #define ABI "unknown"
135 #endif

141 #define DBG(message) \
142  { std::cout << message << "\n"; }
143 #else

147 #endif /* __cplusplus */

152 
153 // Here we will define MAPLE_UNITY_BUILD. When unity build is present we do not
154 // include individual header files but we are building in a single compilation
155 // unit. We need this because we want to take advantage of IDEs that can help
156 // refactor and do other great things. With a UNITY_BUILD however, these
157 // headers are stripped and we build a single compilation unit. This has many
158 // benefits including keeping us honest about writing good code and vastly
159 // improve the build speed. We currently only build single compilation unit
160 // with allheader includes removed from the source files. Using this switch we
161 // will add them in as required to browse the non unity build targets with
162 // complete definitions in place
163 
164 #ifdef MAPLE_SINGLE_COMPILATION_UNIT
165 #define MAPLE_UNITY_BUILD 1
166 #else
167 #define MAPLE_UNITY_BUILD 0
168 #endif
169 
170 // define bool if we are in a standard C compiler
171 #if defined(__STDC__)
172 #include <stdbool.h>
173 #endif
174 
175 
177 #define NOT_ASSIGNABLE(T) T& operator = (const T&) = delete;
178 #define NOT_COPYABLE(T) T(const T&) = delete;
179 
180 
181 
182 #endif /*_MAPLE_PLATFORM_H */
